page.title: New stories
page.description: Discover new stories from the community or create your own! Let your imagination run wild and create your own destiny today!
CommonStoriesSection.text: Join us each evening for a unique and exciting adventure! At 6pm, 7pm and 8pm, we offer you a new interactive story where you will have the power, along with the rest of the community, to decide the fate of the characters. Don't miss this daily appointment to immerse yourself in imaginary worlds and contribute to their evolution!
CommonStoriesSection.wait-common-story-t: The next story will start in
To view the current stories refresh your page
UserStorySection.text: We offer stories with various themes and a starting point that sets up the plot. From that point on, you are the only one in charge and you make all the decisions that will influence the course of the story. Will you be able to make the right decisions to solve the challenges you face?
